professional_summary.headline: [Professional Title] with [X] years of experience in [Industry/Field]
professional_summary.summary: Experienced [Your Title] with a proven track record in [key areas]. Skilled in [primary skills] with expertise in [specialized areas]. Passionate about [what drives you professionally].

experience.title: [Most Recent Job Title]
experience.description: Led [key responsibility] resulting in [quantifiable achievement]. Managed [team size/budget/projects] and improved [specific metric] by [percentage/amount].

experience.title: [Previous Job Title]
experience.description: Responsible for [key duties] and achieved [notable results]. Collaborated with [teams/departments] to [accomplish what].

question_answering.salary_expectation: Competitive, based on market rate and total compensation package
question_answering.why_interested: Excited about the opportunity to contribute my skills and grow with an innovative team
question_answering.work_authorization: Yes, authorized to work without sponsorship

application_questions.why_suitable: My [X] years of experience in [field] and proven track record in [specific area] make me well-suited for this role. I have successfully [key achievement] and am excited to bring these skills to your team.
application_questions.salary_expectation: I am seeking a competitive salary commensurate with my experience and the market rate for this position.
application_questions.availability: I am available to commence within 4 weeks, allowing for appropriate notice period.
application_questions.work_rights: Yes, I have full working rights in Australia with no restrictions.

software_developer.summary_template: Experienced Software Developer with {years} years of expertise in full-stack development. Proficient in {primary_languages} with strong experience in {frameworks}. Passionate about building scalable applications and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

data_scientist.summary_template: Data Scientist with {years} years of experience in machine learning and statistical analysis. Skilled in {ml_frameworks} and experienced in developing predictive models that drive business insights. Strong background in {domain_expertise} with proven ability to translate complex data into actionable recommendations.

product_manager.summary_template: Product Manager with {years} years of experience driving product strategy and execution. Proven track record of launching successful products and features that improve user experience and drive business growth. Strong analytical skills combined with deep understanding of user needs and market dynamics.

marketing_specialist.summary_template: Marketing Specialist with {years} years of experience in digital marketing and brand management. Expertise in developing and executing integrated marketing campaigns that increase brand awareness and drive customer acquisition. Data-driven approach with strong creative and analytical skills.

linkedin: Why are you interested in this position?
What is your expected salary range?
When are you available to start?
Do you have authorization to work?
How many years of experience do you have?
Are you open to remote work?
Why are you looking for a new opportunity?
seek: Why are you suitable for this role?
When are you available to start?
Do you have the right to work in Australia?
Are you willing to undergo background checks?
What is your current employment status?
How did you hear about this position?
Are you available for shift work?
Are you willing to travel for work?
